second: ^I just came to check up on you, the cinema is closing soon. What are you doing?
^Geez! Why did you scare me like that?
^I came outside to take out the trash.

c-0: ^Hahaha! I scared you? My bad... Were you heading back inside to get something?
c-1: ^Okay, it looks like you were on your way back inside. Do you need something?

c-0: ^It's okay, I grabbed them for you. Here you go.

fifth: ^Your shift is over. You can start heading home now..
sixth: ^Tomorrow night you will be closing the theater alone again, and remember.. THE CUSTOMER IS ALWAYS RIGHT!
